heading: Season of Hatred Tier List Updates
content: As part of our Diablo 4 Season of Hatred updates, we've done a complete overhaul of our tier lists. We've also added class tier lists, so you can compare build options for your class of choice. Take a look at our new and updated tier lists to get an idea of how your build stacks up for leveling, endgame, and speedfarming in the upcoming season. We are still in the process of updating our builds and releasing new guides for Season 6, as a result, you may get a 404 error when clicking links in our tier lists. Stay tuned over the next few days as we roll out the build guides and keep an eye out for our branch update post soon! We plan to have all of the build guides ready before Vessel of Hatred launches. You can use the new tier list filters at the top to access class-specific tier lists. Alternatively, if you want to see how builds perform across all classes, take a look at our new and updated tier lists! Click the images below to check out our new class tier lists. Each of the builds are ranked the same as on our main tier list, so for example, there is no S tier for the Barbarian Endgame and Pit Push tier list because none of those builds are in S tier currently. team is hard at work polishing and releasing the build guides for Season of Hatred. Keep an eye out for new and updated builds over the next few days as we approach the Vessel of Hatred launch. With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 6 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
